item.description: Here’s our draft internal map/v0 for ðŸ§Š $icy play, based on our current activities at this borderless software firm. Context: Back in 2018, when i envisioned doing something unconventional with our setup, we introduced ðŸ’Ž $dfg. It came with a dream that everyone on the team can help build next generation software, stay cool making money and own something. I planned to step down and give more ownership to those who actually implement our projects by gradually distributing $dfg to our grind chads.
